raw_body:
SENARATNE – OLIVIA CHITHRANI (nee ABAYASEKARA) – Beloved wife of late Derick,​ mother of Niluka (CEAT Kelani International Tyres (Pvt) Ltd),​ Anishka,​ Dhanusha (Lanka Naigai) and Pradeep (Millennium Super (Pvt) Ltd.),​ mother-in-law of Johann De Silva,​ late Ranjula Peiris,​ Ranjan Dissabandara and Anusha Biyanwila. Remains lie at No. 67,​ Zone 01,​ Millennium City,​ Kotugoda,​ Ja-Ela. till 12.00 noon on Saturday the 30th March 2024 and thereafter at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 1.00 p.m. to 4.00 p.m. and burial at Borella Cemetery ,​ Anglican Section at 4.30 p.m.
021903
